page.title: 19Fraserburgh Pony Express
page.content: Horses and ponies are kept in our patch. They are kept at Philorth Home Farm by the Andersons. In April, l985, the Hunter Trial was held at Philorth Farm. They had a prize draw and raised Â£3,700 for cancer relief. There are 60 jumps for cross country. You only jump 20 but there has to be jumps for all the different groups. The jumping season is between April and September. The Andersons never go into town with the horses because the horses don't like the sound of traffic. They have 4 horses and 3 ponies. The horses' names are: Talking Shop, Jolly Roger, Bob-a-long Ben and Loch Ranza. Talking Shop is 1 year old and is l6.3 hands. Loch Ranza is retired and very shy. The horses go in for lots of competitions and they are always winning.
